translations: 通勤者；每日往返上班者（commuter 的复数）

sentences.sentence: The train was jam-packed with commuters.
sentences.translation: 火车上挤满了上下班的旅客。

sentences.sentence: Commuters will face long delays on the roads today.
sentences.translation: 路远乘车上下班的人今天要在路上耽误很多时间了。

sentences.sentence: Sleepy-eyed commuters were wending their way to work.
sentences.translation: 睡眼朦胧的通勤者拖着沉重的步子去上班。
